content: The original author of MCMA is a person known as "Mystic," who was a prominent member of the WinMX community. Mystic developed and maintained MCMA as a free and open-source plugin for WinMX, and it became widely used among WinMX users. However, since MCMA was not an officially supported plugin and WinMX is no longer in use, there is no longer any active development or support for the program.
